_label: I’d asked Robert Frank if he’d make back-jacket photo for _Cosmopolitan Greetings: Poems 1986-'92_, we crossed Avenue from his old brick house on Bleeker to leafy empty lot stormfenced near CBGB’s Bowery grunge-rock mecca, he snapped lively Portrait, my Leica M6 strapped on Bike carry-rack, we changed places, I saw his familiar face, September 5, 1993.

identified_by.content: I’d asked Robert Frank if he’d make back-jacket photo for _Cosmopolitan Greetings: Poems 1986-'92_, we crossed Avenue from his old brick house on Bleeker to leafy empty lot stormfenced near CBGB’s Bowery grunge-rock mecca, he snapped lively Portrait, my Leica M6 strapped on Bike carry-rack, we changed places, I saw his familiar face, September 5, 1993.
